content: Let's take a floofalicious shot, together!
A precious memory is preserved, maa.
I'll be here for photoshoots anytime, moo problem.
Phew... No way! Did we finish the shot?
Yeep~ I hope it didn't capture anything... Ah, no, nothing!
All done? Want to strike a few more poses?
Yee~? I'm so curious about our photo.
Wonderful, just a normal photo, yeep...
Alright! Let's capture this happy moment. Kula bata!
Well mah~ let's say it together! Cheeeeese—
